marklogic.body:
A person might think to themselves, "If big oil companies have been deep water drilling for decades, why haven't they perfected the fine art of drilling a hole into the sea bed, without destroying ocean ecosystems and blowing up those costly drilling rigs ??"
Oil is filthy, and I'm not talking about it's physical characteristics.. Yes, physically speaking it's slimy, and its filthy to Burn but, what I really mean, is that in order for the world market to consume oil, the oil companies have to come up with newer and slimeyer ways of extracting it.. Fracking, drilling, gasification, using our precious food sources and agricultural land to grow corn for fuel and not to mention the old fashioned way of attaining oil.. Getting into religious, geopolitical wars over it !!
It's time for the International community to fully embrace Green Energy solutions.. Our great grand kids are Depending on us..
